name: CMS
tagline: CMS is easy like a blog-system and powerful as an e-commerce site (and it can be both, of course!)
body:
### Welcome to CMS.
This php-based content management system doesn't have a title yet, but see what we have done:


- [x] language support (english texts will get translatet due to function _t to selectet lang)
- [x] action handling:
  1. plug-ins can queue their functions to actions
  2. advanced parameter passing and callback possibilitys
- [x] theme / widget frontend core
- [x] caching system
- [ ] administrator editing functionality:
  1. creating new sites
  2. changing sites
  3. editing widgets /themes
  4. widget / theme /plug-in overview and control
  5. user control

### The goal
We want to create with this CMS a perfect prepared system with all widgets / themes and plug-ins a person needs, but give them the opportunity to change everything the way they want it.
The system should be easy to use for normal internet user but flexible for nerds to mod it.

### Authors and Contributors
PunktSonstNichts (@PunktSonstNichts)

if you want to join, fork the repo!

***

### Repo issue
To use the CMS, you need the specific mysql database wich isn't published yet.
